verses.arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Abin da ke cikin sammai da abin da ke cikin ƙasã ya yi tasbihi ga Allah alhãli kuwa, Shi ne Mabuwayi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?
verses.hausa: Ya kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmani! Don me kuke faɗin abin dã ba ku aikatãwa?

verses.arabic: كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do.
verses.hausa: Ya girma ga zama abin ƙyãma awurin Allah, ku faɗi abin da bã ku aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ صَفًّا كَأَنَّهُم بُنْيَـٰنٌ مَّرْصُوصٌ
verses.english: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.
verses.hausa: Lalle Allah Yanã son waɗanda ke yin yãƙi dõmin ɗaukaka KalmarSa, a cikin safu kamar sũ gini ne mai ɗamfarar jũna.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِۦ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تُؤْذُونَنِى وَقَد تَّعْلَمُونَ أَنِّى رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا زَاغُوٓا۟ أَزَاغَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.english: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da Mũsã ya ce wa mutãnensa: "Yã mutãnena! sabõda me kuke cũtar da ni, alhãli kuwa lalle kun sani cẽwa lalle nĩ Manzon Al1ah ne zuwa gare ku?" To, a lõkacin da suka karkace, Allah Ya karkatar da zukãtansu. Kuma Allah bã Ya shiryar da mutãne fasiƙai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ إِنِّى رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَيْكُم مُّصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَىَّ مِنَ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَمُبَشِّرًۢا بِرَسُولٍ يَأْتِى مِنۢ بَعْدِى ٱسْمُهُۥٓ أَحْمَدُ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da Ĩsã ɗan Maryayama ya ce: "Yã BanĩIsrã'ĩla! Lalle nĩ Manzon Allah ne zuwa gare ku, mai gaskata abin da ke gaba gare ni na Attaura, kuma mai bãyar da bushãra da wani Manzo da ke zuwa a bãyãna, SũnasaAhmad (Mashãyabo)." To, a lõkacin da ya jẽ musu da hujjõji, suka ce: "Wannan sihiri ne, bayyananne."

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدْعَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلْإِسْلَـٰمِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
verses.hausa: Kuma wãne ne mafi zãlunci daga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ya Jingina ta ga Allah, alhãli kuwa shĩ, anã kiran sa zuwa ga Musulunci? Kuma Allah bã Ya shiryar da mutãne azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطْفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.
verses.hausa: Sunã nufin su bice hasken Allah da bãkunansu alhãli kuwa Allah Mai kammala haskenSa ne, kuma kõ da kãfirai sun ƙi.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.
verses.hausa: Shi ne wanda Ya aiko ManzonSa da shiriya da addĩnin gakiya, dõmin Ya ɗaukaka shi a kan wani addĩni dukansa kuma kõ dã mushirikai sun ƙi.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ تِجَـٰرَةٍ تُنجِيكُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.english: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?
verses.hausa: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Shin, in nũna muku wani fatauci wanda zai tsarshe ku daga wata azãba mai raɗaɗi?

verses.arabic: تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُجَـٰهِدُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know.
verses.hausa: Ku yi ĩmani da Allah da ManzonSa, kuma ku yi jihãdi ga ɗaukaka kalmar Allah game da dũkiyõyinku da rãyukanku. Wannan shĩ ne alhẽri a gare ku idan kun kasance kuna da sani.

verses.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ وَيُدْخِلْكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةً فِى جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.english: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.
verses.hausa: Sai Allah Ya gãfarta muku zunubbanku, kuma Ya shigar da ku gidãjen Aljanna, ƙoramu na gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, da waɗansu ɗãkuna mãsu dãɗi a cikin gidãjen Aljannar zama. Wannan shĩ ne babban rabo, mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَأُخْرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَا ۖ نَصْرٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَتْحٌ قَرِيبٌ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.
verses.hausa: Da wata (falala) da yake kunã son ta; taimako daga Allah da cin nasara wanda yake kusa. Kuma ka yi bushãra ga mũminai.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ كُونُوٓا۟ أَنصَارَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَا قَالَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ لِلْحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ مَنْ أَنصَارِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ ٱلْحَوَارِيُّونَ نَحْنُ أَنصَارُ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَـَٔامَنَت طَّآئِفَةٌ مِّنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَكَفَرَت طَّآئِفَةٌ ۖ فَأَيَّدْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ عَلَىٰ عَدُوِّهِمْ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ ظَـٰهِرِينَ
verses.english: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.
verses.hausa: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmani! Ku kasance mataimakan Allah kamar abin da Ĩsã ɗanMaryama ya ce ga Hawãriyãwa, "Waɗanne ne mataimakãna zuwa ga (aikin) Allah?" Sai wata ƙungiya daga Banĩ Isrã'ĩla ta yi ĩmãni, kuma wata ƙungiya ta kãfirta. Sai muka ƙarfafa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni a kan maƙiyansu, sabõda haka suka wãyi gari marinjãya.
